TestCase.name: testMultiDim1
TestCase.Resource: query all product family and all quarters

With Set [*NATIVE_CJ_SET] as 'NonEmptyCrossJoin([*BASE_MEMBERS_Product],[*BASE_MEMBERS_Time])' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] as '{[Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0]}' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Product] as '[Product].[Product Family].Members' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Product].CurrentMember})' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Time] as '[Time].[Quarter].Members' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Time] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Time].CurrentMember})' Member [Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0] as '[Measures].[Unit Sales]', FORMAT_STRING = '#,##0', SOLVE_ORDER=300 Select [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] on columns, Non Empty Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {([Product].CurrentMember,[Time].CurrentMember)}) on rows From [Warehouse and Sales]

TestCase.name: testMultiDim2
TestCase.Resource: query all product family and some quarters

With Set [*NATIVE_CJ_SET] as 'NonEmptyCrossJoin([*BASE_MEMBERS_Product],[*BASE_MEMBERS_Time])' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] as '{[Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0]}' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Product] as '[Product].[Product Family].Members' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Product].CurrentMember})' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Time] as '{[Time].[1997].[Q1],[Time].[1997].[Q3]}' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Time] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Time].CurrentMember})' Member [Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0] as '[Measures].[Unit Sales]', FORMAT_STRING = '#,##0', SOLVE_ORDER=300 Select [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] on columns, Non Empty Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {([Product].CurrentMember,[Time].CurrentMember)}) on rows From [Warehouse and Sales]

TestCase.name: testMultiDim3
TestCase.Resource: query all Drink product family and all quarters

With Set [*NATIVE_CJ_SET] as 'NonEmptyCrossJoin([*BASE_MEMBERS_Product],[*BASE_MEMBERS_Time])' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] as '{[Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0]}' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Product] as '{[Product].[Drink]}' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Product].CurrentMember})' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Time] as '[Time].[Quarter].Members' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Time] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Time].CurrentMember})' Member [Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0] as '[Measures].[Unit Sales]', FORMAT_STRING = '#,##0', SOLVE_ORDER=300 Select [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] on columns, Non Empty Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {([Product].CurrentMember,[Time].CurrentMember)}) on rows From [Warehouse and Sales]

TestCase.name: testMultiDim4
TestCase.Resource: query only drink and some quarters

With Set [*NATIVE_CJ_SET] as 'NonEmptyCrossJoin([*BASE_MEMBERS_Product],[*BASE_MEMBERS_Time])' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] as '{[Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0]}' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Product] as '{[Product].[Drink]}' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Product].CurrentMember})' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Time] as '{[Time].[1997].[Q1],[Time].[1997].[Q3]}' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Time] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Time].CurrentMember})' Member [Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0] as '[Measures].[Unit Sales]', FORMAT_STRING = '#,##0', SOLVE_ORDER=300 Select [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] on columns, Non Empty Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {([Product].CurrentMember,[Time].CurrentMember)}) on rows From [Warehouse and Sales]

TestCase.name: testMultiDim5
TestCase.Resource: With Set [*NATIVE_CJ_SET] as 'NonEmptyCrossJoin([*BASE_MEMBERS_Time],[*BASE_MEMBERS_Product])' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] as '{[Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0]}' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Time] as '[Time].[Quarter].Members' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Time] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Time].CurrentMember})' Set [*BASE_MEMBERS_Product] as '{[Product].[Drink]}' Set [*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product] as 'Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {[Product].CurrentMember})' Member [Measures].[*FORMATTED_MEASURE_0] as '[Measures].[Unit Sales]', FORMAT_STRING = '#,##0', SOLVE_ORDER=300 Member [Product].[*FILTER_MEMBER] as 'Aggregate ([*NATIVE_MEMBERS_Product])', SOLVE_ORDER=-200 Select [*BASE_MEMBERS_Measures] on columns, Non Empty Generate([*NATIVE_CJ_SET], {([Time].CurrentMember)}) on rows From [Warehouse and Sales] Where ([Product].[*FILTER_MEMBER])
